response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/soap">
  <soap:Header/>
  <soap:Body>
    <tns:getEmployeeDetailsResponse>
      <tns:employeeDetails>
        <tns:employeeId>1001</tns:employeeId>
        <tns:employeeName>田中太郎</tns:employeeName>
        <tns:department>開発部</tns:department>
        <tns:email>tanaka@example.com</tns:email>
        <tns:hireDate>2020-04-01</tns:hireDate>
        <tns:salary>500000</tns:salary>
        <tns:level>Senior</tns:level>
        <tns:bonus>150000</tns:bonus>
        <tns:status>Active</tns:status>
      </tns:employeeDetails>
    </tns:getEmployeeDetailsResponse>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
